name: No Money To Burn
description:
Mini Jam 124: Warmth

Limitation: Your Score Serves a Purpose

Your office building is burning down and it's going to cost the company a fortune. It's your job to save as many supplies from the flames as possible by putting your life in danger. Don't worry; you have health insurance, as long as the company can afford it.

For those looking for a challenge:

My personal record is $1370 (KingPiEta) and the best non-dev score I've seen is $1200.

How To Play:
  • The fire will spread downwards at an increasing rate so you need to be careful to avoid getting scorched.
  • Press down to pick up boxes and press up to throw them off the edge, giving you a measly $10 per box.
  • Every time you die to the fire, the company will pay your health expenses which allows you to be raised from the dead. This costs $100 though.
Credits & Assets
  • @KingPieEater - programming
  • @spavolk - art, design & SFX
  • Jimmy Campbell - font
